animeDescription: Three Tales was one of the first domestic anime ever televised. It comprised of three stories: "The Third Plate" (第三の皿) by Hirosuke Hamada, "Oppel and the Elephant" (オッペルと象) by Kenji Miyazawa, and "Sleepy Town" (眠い町) by Mimei Ogawa.
animeStaff: [['Wada Makoto', ['Director']], ['Nakahara Shuuichi', ['Director', 'Animation Director']], ['Miyazawa Kenji', ['Original Creator']], ['Hamada Hirosuke', ['Original Creator']]]
